<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|list|minecraft:suspicious_stew_effects}}: A list of unamplified [[mob effects]] given to the player or mob upon consuming this item (normally a [[suspicious stew]]). <code>[[Data component format#potion_duration_scale|minecraft:potion_duration_scale]]</code> is ignored. When present on an item, text is added to the item's tooltip only when it is inside of the [[creative inventory|item selection screen]].
*** {{nbt|compound}}: A single custom effect.
**** {{nbt|string|id}}: The ID of the effect.
**** {{nbt|int|duration}}: The duration of the effect in [[tick]]s. Defaults to 160.<!--
